note.p: Birth: Ludgate Hill, London, England (19 April 1814)

Career: Apprenticed to Mr Graham, grocer, Ludgate Hill (aged 13); opened a shop selling natural history specimens, and publishing conchological works, in King William Street, Strand, London (1830s); editor and proprietor of the Literary Gazette (1850-1856)
Memberships: FLS (1846); FGS (1853); Natural History Society, Wurtmeburg (Corresponding); Ipswich Museum (Honorary)
